name: Pulao
description: A special type of steamed rice served with many kinds of soup, vegetables and meat.

name: Ghundruk & Dhido Combo
description: Gundruk is a Dried leaf vegetables could be a soured inexperienced greens . It is typical Nepalese snack, claiming to be one among the national dishes.

name: Pani Puri
description: Panipuri, phuchka, gupchup, golgappa, or pani ke patashe is a type of snack originating in the Indian subcontinent, where it is an extremely common street food.
